At Bellarmine, you'll discover a liberal arts university on a beautiful campus in a world-class city. You'll discover faculty scholars who are experts in their fields but who are also personable, caring and passionate about teaching. You'll discover students who love to learn and who care about each other, their community and the world. We invite you to discover Bellarmine in person by scheduling a campus visit.
